game.name: BFF Matching Tattoos
game.description:
In the huge Disney World, there are lots of different things to explore for each princess. However, it also happens that sometimes they have fallen in love with the same things and enjoy spending time together while enjoying the same activities and hobbies as well. This brand new girls game is going to set an example of a beautiful and powerful friendship. You would meet today with the two couples of best friends who are waiting for your help. Join BFF Matching Tattoos and be prepared to make their friendship stronger than before!

The four popular princesses are Moana, Elsa, Ariel and Mulan. Your job in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls is to help each girl find the best partner in crime. After making a decision over the selection of the couples of the best friends, you have to work on guiding them to choose the nice outfits and combine them with the matching tattoos. The advanced version of BFF necklaces are seen as the form of the matching tattoos. 

Click the play button and get ready to select the awesome outfits combined with the cool tattoos on their arms for each group of best friends! Do not take the tattoo selection with ease since it will also help to symbolize the best friendship of each group of girls. Give all the girls nice outfits so that they can stand out of the crowd in this dress up mobile game! It features multiple awesome matching tattoo styles combined with four beautiful princesses. Put your best to show their special bond of friendship in front of the entire world! Play more dress-up games for girls and have fun alone or with your friends without download!
